ai-patthana22.12:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in MN 5.)
ai-patthana22.12:0.3_0: Standing on the bank of the skillful, they apply themselves to sword.
ai-patthana22.12:1.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the undeclared points.
ai-patthana22.12:1.1_2: There are not declared by nature.
ai-patthana22.12:2.1_0: Nor do they arise because of the skillful teaching.
ai-patthana22.12:2.1_1: not undeclared points the wrong way, for the sake of undeclared, the causes and the reasons. ...
ai-patthana22.12:2.1_2: (These two discourses should be expanded in the same way.)
